name: Omega Squad (Spargit Studio)
description:
Omega Squad is a deckbuilding roguelike similar to games like Slay the Spire, but with a unique twist.

You have 2 characters instead of 1, and if either die, it's GAME OVER. Throughout a run, Collaborating or Conflicting with your teammate's intentions will grant your cards different effects!

Please make sure you read the tutorial, I know text tutorials suck, but it contains important information.
